name: GW ANIMALS
description:
🐹 GW ANIMALS 🐹

GW ANIMALS  is free Trivia about animals around the world 🐸🦓🐔

This app is for individuals who want to challenge their knowledge about Animals around the world.

GW ANIMALS 🐖🐄🐘  has a wide variety of Animals  which is fun and educational to play for both children and adults....  Complete the levels to Earn and Double your rewards.... Test your animal knowledge and Download and Play GW ANIMALS today...

▶ For all Ages 

▶ Free and Easy to Download

▶ Animals featured (Wild and Domesticated)

▶ Friendly User Interface

▶ Friendly User Interface

▶ Amazing Graphics

▶ Educational 

▶ 100 levels (New levels will always be updated)

▶ Difficulty level: Easy, Medium and Hard
